name: typescript-react-demo
description: This is a reference demo, written in TypeScript, that illustrates features and design patterns applicable to a more substantial React-based application.

scripts.clean: echo "Cleaning Output Folders" | chalk cyan && echo. && rimraf ./dist && rimraf ./doc && rimraf ./build && rimraf ./coverage && rimraf ./.nyc_output && echo.
scripts.filecheck: echo "Type Check (JS -> TS)" | chalk cyan && fsls ./src/**/*.js | chalk yellow && echo "Type Check (JSX -> TSX)" | chalk cyan && fsls ./src/**/*.jsx | chalk yellow && echo "Type Check (CSS -> SCSS)" | chalk cyan && fsls ./src/**/*.css | chalk yellow
scripts.testcheck: echo "Test Check" | chalk cyan && echo. && node mocha.check.ts && echo.
scripts.lint: echo "Style Check (JS / JSX)" | chalk cyan && echo. && eslint ./*.js ./*.jsx ./src/**/*.js ./src/**/*.jsx && echo. && echo "Style Check (TS / TSX)" | chalk cyan && echo. && tslint --project ./tsconfig.json ./*.ts ./*.tsx ./src/**/*.ts ./src/**/*.tsx && echo. && echo "Style Check (JSON)" | chalk cyan && echo. && jsonlint-cli ./*.json ./src/**/*.json && echo. && echo "Style Check (SCSS)" | chalk cyan && echo. && sass-lint ./*.scss ./src/**/*.scss --verbose && echo. && echo "Style Check (MD)" | chalk cyan && echo. && markdownlint ./README.md ./src/ && echo. && echo "Style Check (HTM / HTML / XHTML)" | chalk cyan && echo. && htmlhint --config .htmlhintrc ./src/**/*.{htm,html,xhtml} && echo.
scripts.doc: echo "Generating Documentation" | chalk cyan && echo. && typedoc --options typedoc.json | chalk red && echo.
scripts.test:prep: echo "Preparing Tests" | chalk cyan && echo. && rimraf ./build && rimraf ./coverage && rimraf ./.nyc_output && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && copyfiles -e src/**/*.ts -e src/**/*.tsx src/**/*.* build && echo.
scripts.test:exec: echo "Executing Tests" | chalk cyan && echo. && rimraf ./build && rimraf ./coverage && rimraf ./.nyc_output && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && copyfiles -e src/**/*.ts -e src/**/*.tsx src/**/*.* build && echo. && nyc mocha --opts mocha.opts && nyc report && echo.

build:local.command: npm run filecheck && npm run testcheck && npm run lint && echo "Building Application (Local)" | chalk cyan && echo. && webpack --display-modules --config webpack.config.debug.js && echo. && npm run doc && npm run test:exec

build:development.command: npm run filecheck && npm run testcheck && npm run lint && echo "Building Application (Development)" | chalk cyan && echo. && webpack --display-modules --config webpack.config.release.js && echo. && npm run doc && npm run test:exec

build:qa.command: npm run filecheck && npm run testcheck && npm run lint && echo "Building Application (QA)" | chalk cyan && echo. && webpack --display-modules --config webpack.config.release.js && echo. && npm run doc && npm run test:exec

build:stage.command: npm run filecheck && npm run testcheck && npm run lint && echo "Building Application (Stage)" | chalk cyan && echo. && webpack --display-modules --config webpack.config.release.js && echo. && npm run doc && npm run test:exec

build:production.command: npm run filecheck && npm run testcheck && npm run lint && echo "Building Application (Production)" | chalk cyan && echo. && webpack --display-modules --config webpack.config.release.js && echo. && npm run doc && npm run test:exec
